chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_snd: BaseParams
base_fst: BaseParams
multi_fst: MultiParams base_fst
multi_snd: MultiParams base_snd
base_map: BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd
name_map: MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
msg_map: MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
name_map_bijective: MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map
multi_map_congr: MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map
tot_map_output_injective: forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o'

Goal:
forall (net net' : network) (out : list (name * (input + list output))) (mnet : network) (mout : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async net net' out -> tot_map_net mnet = net -> map tot_map_trace_occ mout = out -> exists mnet' : network, step_async mnet mnet' mout /\ tot_map_net mnet' = net'

Premises:
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Record MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (M : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) : Prop := Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective { tot_map_name_inv_inverse : forall n : name, tot_map_name_inv (tot_map_name n) = n; tot_map_name_inverse_inv : forall n : name, tot_map_name (tot_map_name_inv n) = n } Arguments MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective {B0 B1 P0 P1} Arguments Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective [B0 B1 P0 P1] _ (_ _)%function_scope
tot_map_trace_occ = fun e : name * (input + list output) => let (n, s) := e in match s with | inl io => (tot_map_name n, inl (tot_map_input io)) | inr lo => (tot_map_name n, inr (map tot_map_output lo)) end : name * (input + list output) -> name * (input + list output)
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
tot_map_net = fun net : network => {| nwPackets := map tot_map_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun n : name => tot_map_data (nwState net (tot_map_name_inv n)) |} : network -> network
Record BaseParamsTotalMap (P0 P1 : BaseParams) : Type := Build_BaseParamsTotalMap { tot_map_data : data -> data; tot_map_input : input -> input; tot_map_output : output -> output } Arguments Build_BaseParamsTotalMap _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
MultiParamsNameTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
Inductive step_async (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> MultiParamsMsgTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
MultiParamsMsgTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
tot_map_output = fun (P0 P1 : BaseParams) (BaseParamsTotalMap0 : BaseParamsTotalMap P0 P1) => let (_, _, tot_map_output) := BaseParamsTotalMap0 in tot_map_output : forall P0 P1 : BaseParams, BaseParamsTotalMap P0 P1 -> output -> output Arguments tot_map_output {P0 P1 BaseParamsTotalMap}
tot_map_trace_occ_in_inv : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (h : name) (inp : input) (out : list output), map tot_map_trace_occ tr = [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] -> exists (h' : name) (inp' : input) (out' : list output), tr = [(h', inl inp'); (h', inr out')] /\ tot_map_name h' = h /\ map tot_map_output out' = out /\ tot_map_input inp' = inp
step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> o = o' |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_sind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> o = o' |- FailureParams ?P]
step_async_tot_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async net net' tr -> step_async (tot_map_net net) (tot_map_net net') (map tot_map_trace_occ tr)
step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> o = o' |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_sind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> o = o' |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') []) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') []) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_s_sind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l ->...-> o = o' |- SingleParams ?P]
step_s_ind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l ->...-> o = o' |- SingleParams ?P]
tot_map_trace_occ_inv : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (n : name) (ol : list output), map tot_map_trace_occ tr = [(n, inr ol)] -> exists (n' : name) (lo : list output), tr = [(n', inr lo)] /\ tot_map_name n' = n /\ map tot_map_output lo = ol
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (odnwPackets net) from to ms) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) to (Some d') |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) ->...-> o = o' |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) ->...-> o = o' |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
SST_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> step_s s s' tr where ?P : [base_fst : BaseParams base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' ->...-> o = o' |- SingleParams ?P]
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_failure_disk_ops_ind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> o = o' |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_failure_disk_ops_sind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> o = o' |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_ordered_ind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> P net net' tr) ->...-> P o o0 l
step_ordered_sind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> P net net' tr) ->...-> P o o0 l
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} ->...-> o = o' |- FailureParams ?P]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (odnwPackets net) from to ms) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) to (Some d') |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets h l ++ nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} ->...-> o = o' |- FailureParams ?P]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepFailure_drop : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [base_fst : BaseParams base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' ->...-> o = o' |- FailureParams ?P]
StepAsync_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets h l ++ nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} -> step_async net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)]
StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepFailure_dup : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwState := nwState net |} ->...-> o = o' |- FailureParams ?P]
ordered_dynamic_initialized_state : forall (net : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> forall n : name, In n (odnwNodes net) -> exists d : data, odnwState net n = Some d where ?base_params : [base_fst : BaseParams base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' ->...-> o = o' |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
Inductive step_drop (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_drop net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_drop {P params} Arguments StepDrop_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_drop {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
StepFailureDiskOp_deliver : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed -> do_net_handlers (do_pDst p) (do_pSrc p) (do_pBody p) (nwdoState net (do_pDst p)) = (ops, out, d, l) ->...-> o = o' |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_dup net net' [] Arguments step_dup {P params} Arguments StepDup_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_dup {P params} _ [net' p] (_ _)%list_scope

```
intros net net' out mnet mout H1 H2 H3.
destruct H1 as [p xs ys o d l Hp Hn Hd ->].
exists {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState mnet) (pDst p) d |}.
split.
- constructor; auto.
- rewrite H2, H3. reflexivity.
